product.title: A Fish Out of Water | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
What happens when a boy feeds a fish too much food? A Fish Out of Water is a growing—and BIG—problem in this timeless story about a little boy who wants to make his new pet fish happy. Told with easy-to-read words by Helen Palmer and entertaining illustrations by P.D. Eastman, A Fish Out of Water is sure to make a splash with readers.

Tie-in Activity: Give your baby some soft toys and containers of different sizes, and let him put the toys into the containers. What fits where? Or cut some fish shapes out of clean, dry sponges and let your child watch the fish change when they get wet.
